channel.title: Beliefs on Graham Chalfant
channel.description: Recent content in Beliefs on Graham Chalfant

item.title: Your Subconscious Beliefs
item.description: Picture by Matteo Grando Have you ever taken a moment to consider that there are 7.6 billion people on our planet, and each of them uniquely experiences life? Why are some people extremely anxious and others are not? Why can some people give amazing public speeches and others cannot? Why can some people make tons of friends and others cannot? Why do some people seem to fail at everything and others do not?
